summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 CHEVROLET SILVERADO 2500. WHILE DRIVING IN SECOND AND THIRD GEARS, THE TRANSMISSION SUDDENLY MALFUNCTIONED AND THE VEHICLE DECELERATED SIGNIFICANTLY. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO BROMIN CHEVROLET IN BROMIN, FLORIDA WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE TRANSMISSION WAS FAULTY AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE, BUT NO ASSISTANCE WAS OFFERED. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 80,000.
